title: Water in a pool part - c

content.question: Use the results from parts (a) and (b) to approximate the volume of water in the pool at time t=12 hours. Round your answer to the nearest cubic foot.

frqParts.text: Use the results from parts (a) and (b) to approximate the volume of water in the pool at time t=12 hours. Round your answer to the nearest cubic foot.
